There's a PR waiting for testing and review that seems important to get released soon. It's a regression from 1.17.0 and the longer we wait, the less useful it will be.

Assuming that many people will update to 1.17.1 it seems sort of urgent to me: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4626

Error: Call to a member function init() on null in view->init_localization() on updating core (latest release) 路 Issue #4626 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
